from math import ceil
n = int(input())
for _ in range(n):
    (N, K) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(ceil(N / 5) - ceil(K / 5))

import math
for t in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    N = math.ceil(n / 5)
    m = math.ceil(k / 5)
    print(N - m)

tc = int(input())
for _ in range(tc):
    (n, k) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ins = [i // 5 + 1 for i in range(n)]
    afs = [i // 5 + 1 for i in range(n - 1)]
    del ins[k - 1]
    print(sum([i != j for (i, j) in zip(ins, afs)]))

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    original_days = [(i - 1) // 5 + 1 for i in range(1, n + 1)]
    k_day = original_days[k - 1]
    original_days.pop(k - 1)
    shifted_days = [(i - 1) // 5 + 1 for i in range(1, n)]
    num_changed = sum([1 for i in range(n - 1) if original_days[i] != shifted_days[i]])
    print(num_changed)

    num_changed = sum([1 for i in range(n - 1) if original_days[i] != shifted_days[i]])

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (N, K) = map(int, input().split())
    joining_day = (K - 1) // 5 + 1
    total_joining_days = (N - 1) // 5 + 1
    candidates_on_wrong_day = max(total_joining_days - joining_day, 0)
    print(candidates_on_wrong_day)

t = int(input())
for i in range(0, t):
    (n, k) = input().split()
    n = int(n)
    k = int(k)
    x = int((n + 4) / 5)
    y = int((k + 4) / 5)
    v = x - y
    print(v)
